name: Install & Setting
desc_card: In this video tutorial you will learn how to install FREEWAT in QGIS and how to organize the project workbook by implementing a groundwater flow model using real data.
recommendations:
This tutorial has been successfully tested on WINDOWS 10 and WINDOWS 11, using the QGIS versions 3.28 through 3.32

Recommendations BEFORE you begin, take notes to AVOID errors:

  • Before starting the installation procedure make sure QGIS is NOT running on your machine
  • When you start the installation process you will see your machine's CMD run, Do NOT open any windows !!!Just WAIT!!!
  • If a PROXY window is displayed at the end of the installation, absolutely DO NOT check this box.
  • remember to name ALL files with only literal characters and no spaces but with underscore - example model_domain_T0.shp
  • create a project directory in (C:) -> example C:\freewat\mf0
aims_tutorial:
This tutorial aims to introduce the development and implementation of a model of groundwater flow using real data.
The specific objectives of this tutorial are:

  • Identify the processes that control groundwater flow through the conceptual model definition;
  • Implement a numerical model to simulate the hydrodynamics of groundwater groundwater under transient conditions;
  • Verification of piezometric level lowering over time due to the presence of the pumping well.
